Greeting.Name: JIMUK CHOI
Greeting.Slogan: Creativity, Skill, and Communication in Every Design

WhoIam.Title: Who I am
WhoIam.MainText: I am a Product Designer focused on UX/UI planning and strategy
WhoIam.SubText: I simplify complex systems in industries such as shipping, port logistics, and sales solutions into clear, intuitive experiences, taking ownership from planning and design to project scheduling. With a background in design and front-end publishing, I create feasible, developer-friendly designs, and my strength lies in meticulous coordination and collaboration that enhance the quality and success of projects.

List.title: UX Research & Strategy
List.content: I start by understanding who the users are and why they need this product. Through persona definition, competitor benchmarking, and user research, I define problems and establish UX strategies aligned with business goals.

List.title: Information Architecture
List.content: I design complex information into structures that users can easily understand. Through IA redesign, userflow definition, and screen structure design, I create experiences where user navigation flows naturally.

List.title: Design Systems
List.content: I build systematic design systems based on Atomic Design. Through consistent component libraries and style guides, I enhance design-development collaboration efficiency and create scalable products.

List.title: UI/UX Design
List.content: Based on strategy and structure, I design intuitive and attractive interfaces. From B2B solutions to data visualization, I translate complex functions into user-friendly screens.

List.title: Design Engineering
List.content: With HTML, CSS, JavaScript publishing experience and Figma-Cursor MCP integration, I minimize the gap between design and development. I propose realistic designs considering implementation feasibility.
